name: BED_BLOCK_EVENTS
description: This view contains the details on the various updates made to a bed block, such as adding or removing the block, including who updated the block and when they made that update. The records included in this view are Bed Events (BEV) records that are designated as bed blocks -- that is Event Type (I BEV 150), has a value of 1.

columns.name: BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status category number for the bed event status update.

columns.name: INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the bed event status update happened.

columns.name: UPD_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for the user who entered this bed event status update.

columns.name: UPD_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The update reason category number for this bed event status update.

columns.name: ASSOC_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Admission, Transfer, Discharge, or Leave of Absence (ADT) event that is associated with this bed event status update.

columns.name: ASSOC_PEND_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pending event that is associated with this bed event status update.

columns.name: ASSOC_CLEAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the cleaning request associated with this bed event status update.
